output: pdf_document

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(janitor)
```



```{r}
##data wrangling ----
df <- ipums_time_used %>% 
  clean_names() %>%
  filter(!is.na(wb_resp)) %>%
  select(-wt06, -pernum, -lineno)%>%
  mutate(wellbeing = case_when(
    wb_resp == "FALSE"~ 0, 
    wb_resp == "TRUE" ~ 1))
```
